ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In it is a gushing spring
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There is a stream of running water in it;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: In it there shall be a flowing spring,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Therein will be a flowing spring,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In it is a flowing spring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Therein will be a running spring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Therein shall be a spring running!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: In it is a flowing spring
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Therein will be a bubbling spring:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Therein will be a running spring,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: A gushing fountain shall be there
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In it is a flowing spring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Within it is a flowing spring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [88:12] therein is a running spring, of water, meaning ‘springs’;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Wherein) in Paradise (is a gushing spring) gushing with goodness, grace and mercy for them,
